about_the_game:
Explore a magical world full of secrets, puzzles and enemies!
The Black Dragon, a mighty creature from the Shadow Realm, devours the light of the island. Embark on a journey across 6 enchanting worlds, learn powerful abilities and stop its evil forces! "A Dragon's Tale: Fading Light" is a unique action platformer with various RPG elements such as a skill-tree and leveling-system. The abilities can be combined in unique ways by the player to solve challenging puzzles, do platforming or battle enemies & mighty bosses.

More features:
  • 6 worlds & 24 unique levels
  • 18 powerful abilities with 9 levels each
  • 6 challenging boss battles
  • Over 250 secrets and items to find and collect
  • Estimated 10+ hour playtime per campaign
  • Epic original game soundtrack composed by Jonas Kopetzky


Master 18 abilities including fireballs, lightning rays, thorns & many more and combine them to become the strongest dragon!
Find magical runes scattered across the levels and use them to unlock more & more abilities in the skill tree. Combine devastating attacks with helpful support abilities like shields, healing & various other buffs.


Collect elemental fragments to increase the power of your abilities!
Every ability can be upgraded to level 9, gaining more power with each level. This lets you improve your favourite abilities and further customize your playing style.

Get Involved


Help building a community for the game!
Join the Discord to follow the development of the game. Stay up to date, participate in events and maybe even get involved in the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 950 | AMD R7 370
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower specs might still work; 16:9, 1080p recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 | Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 | AMD RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9, 1080p recommended

short_description: Embark on a journey as a small dragon across enchanting worlds, find runes with arcane powers and learn many powerful abilities. Master them to solve puzzles, defeat mighty enemies and eventually face the Black Dragon in this unique action-platformer!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian
